column4: I have invalid format on one monitor & 59.9 low resolution error on another. Help please I'm new sorry guys
I can only see ubuntu from live cd :(
I only have ubuntu
Is there a way to fix resolution from cd?
I'd try what's on that wiki page (a live cd shouldn't be required).  If you're booting from a live cd just mount your install and chroot in
you need to be more specific
what exactly does it say in full?
can you get to grub? (hold shift during boot)
hmm, so the message pops up before /as grub loads?  Weird.
well you should be able to modify grub settings from there, but I'm not sure what you would need to modify
the first thing I might try is to have the grub menu always show up (by editing grub settings).  Note you need to edit /etc/default/grub and then run update-grub *in the chroot for your install*
first, mount the partition for your install.  Are you able to do that?
right, but you want to access the partition on your hard drive for your install
in nautilus, you can probably just click on your partition
can you open a terminal?
I am also not familiar with unity. Maybe someone else can help you with that step (ask the channel)
be more specific.  What does "fail" mean?
Failed to fetch http://ppa.launchpad.net/ubuntu-audio-dev/ppa/ubuntu/dists/oneiric/main/source/Sources  404  Not Found
that ppa does not exist for oneiric
oh I'm trying to get audio to work.
ask your actual question
